pullRequest.title: Add known issues into categories in Allure report

nodes.bodyText:
since writeExecutorInfo creates ObjectMapper as well and ObjectMapper is thread-safe, I propose

to create a new field: ObjectMapper obejctMapper
to use it in both writeCategoriesInfo and writeExecutorInfo
this logic of writing the data to the file is very similar to the logic from writeExecutorInfo so I propose to move the common part to a new method and reuse it
